title: CATL 75kWh LFP Battery Pack
description: A robust and reliable 75kWh Lithium Iron Phosphate (LFP) battery pack from CATL. Pulled from a low-mileage vehicle. Ideal for EV conversion projects or as a replacement. State of Health (SOH) is excellent.

title: LG Chem 64kWh NMC Battery Module
description: High-energy density 64kWh Nickel Manganese Cobalt (NMC) battery module from LG Chem. Perfect for projects requiring a balance of power and range. Comes with original BMS wiring harness.

title: Panasonic 82kWh Pack for Tesla Model 3/Y
description: Original 2170 cell Panasonic 82kWh battery pack, salvaged from a 2022 Tesla Model 3. Low cycles, excellent health. A perfect high-performance replacement or for a high-power DIY project.

title: Samsung SDI 94Ah BMW i3 Battery
description: A complete 42.2kWh battery pack from a 2020 BMW i3. Manufactured by Samsung SDI. Known for its reliability and compact form factor. Ideal for smaller vehicle conversions or energy storage.

specifications.installation: Requires custom mounting for non-i3 use

title: SK Innovation 77.4kWh Pack for Hyundai/Kia
description: E-GMP platform 77.4kWh battery pack from SK Innovation. Pulled from a 2022 Kia EV6. Features ultra-fast charging capabilities. Excellent condition, ready for a new life.

specifications.installation: Direct fit for E-GMP platform vehicles

title: BYD Blade Battery 60.5kWh Pack
description: Revolutionary Blade Battery technology from BYD. 60.5kWh pack from a 2023 Atto 3. Known for its exceptional safety and long cycle life. A top choice for safety-critical applications.

title: A123 Systems 48V LFP Module
description: A compact and robust 48V, 2.5kWh LFP module from A123 Systems. Perfect for golf carts, small utility vehicles, or 48V home energy storage systems. Multiple units available.

title: Gotion High-tech 50kWh LFP Pack
description: Affordable and reliable 50kWh LFP battery pack from Gotion High-tech. A great budget option for EV conversions where extreme performance is not the priority. Good condition.

title: EVE Energy 40kWh NMC Battery
description: 40kWh NMC battery from EVE Energy. Good energy density in a relatively small package. Pulled from a city commuter EV. Health tested and verified.

title: Farasis Energy 90kWh High-Performance Pack
description: High-performance 90kWh battery pack from Farasis Energy, designed for luxury EVs. Excellent power output and thermal management. Salvaged from a low-mileage premium vehicle.

specifications.installation: Requires professional installation for high-power systems

title: Tesla Model S/X 100kWh Battery Pack
description: Complete 100kWh battery pack from a 2019 Tesla Model S. Still holds excellent charge and has been professionally tested. Ideal for a high-range conversion or as a large-scale powerwall.

specifications.installation: Direct fit for Tesla Model S/X

title: CATL 52kWh Pack for VW ID Series
description: A 52kWh (net) battery pack from CATL, used in the Volkswagen ID series. Great reliability and integration with the MEB platform. Pulled from a 2021 model.

specifications.installation: Direct fit for MEB platform vehicles

title: LG Chem 70kWh Bolt EV Battery
description: Upgraded 70kWh battery pack for Chevrolet Bolt EV. Manufactured by LG Chem. This is a great upgrade for older Bolt models, offering increased range. Excellent health.

specifications.installation: Direct fit for Chevrolet Bolt EV

title: Panasonic 4680 Structural Pack (Module)
description: A single module from a Tesla 4680 structural battery pack. For research, development, or small-scale projects. This is next-generation battery tech. Sold as-is.

title: SK Innovation 105kWh Ford F-150 Lightning Pack
description: Standard range 105kWh battery pack from a Ford F-150 Lightning. Incredible power output capabilities, perfect for a high-performance truck or large vehicle conversion.

title: BYD 30kWh Dolphin Battery
description: Compact 30.7kWh LFP Blade Battery from a BYD Dolphin. Ideal for a small city car conversion or a large home solar storage system. Excellent safety and longevity.

title: Samsung SDI 85kWh Rivian R1S Pack
description: 85kWh battery pack from a Rivian R1S, manufactured by Samsung SDI. High-quality cells with excellent thermal management. A great option for off-road or high-demand applications.

title: CATL 100kWh Shenxing Plus LFP Battery
description: State-of-the-art Shenxing Plus battery from CATL with 4C charging. This 100kWh LFP pack can charge incredibly fast. Pulled from a demo vehicle. Perfect for high-use applications.

title: LG Chem 16kWh PHEV Battery
description: A small and compact 16kWh battery from an LG Chem-supplied Plug-in Hybrid. Ideal for smaller projects, motorcycle conversions, or as a buffer in a solar system. Low cycles.

title: Panasonic 75kWh Pack for Tesla Model 3 SR+
description: Original Panasonic 75kWh battery pack from a 2021 Tesla Model 3 Standard Range Plus. Excellent condition, professionally removed and tested. A great replacement part.

specifications.installation: Direct fit for Tesla Model 3 SR+
